purpose: Looks up a content tree node by its ID from the tree state, returning the node or null if not found
Inserts a new folder node as a child of the specified parent in the content tree, returning updated state
Updates the name of a specific node in the content tree and refreshes the updatedAt timestamp
Removes a node and its descendants from the content tree by ID, returning the updated state
Relocates a node to a new parent at a given index within the content tree, preserving all node data
Adds a content item node (chronicle, entity page, etc.) as a child of the given parent folder in the tree
Converts the nested content tree into a flat ordered list of nodes with depth and path information for export ordering
Collects all content IDs referenced by leaf nodes in the tree into a Set for membership testing
Transforms content tree nodes into the shape expected by the react-arborist drag-and-drop tree library
Converts react-arborist output back into the application's internal ContentTreeNode format after a reorder or move
Fills the content tree with all world content in the canonical book order: eras, narratives, chronicles, entity encyclopedia, and static pages
Escapes special XML characters in a string so it can be safely embedded in ICML document markup
Renders an array of ICML paragraph objects into a single XML string separated by line breaks

Creates an ICML paragraph with a single unstyled text run using the specified paragraph style
Creates an ICML paragraph whose text is parsed for inline markdown formatting into character style runs
Converts a markdown string into an array of ICML paragraphs, handling headings, blockquotes, rules, image markers, and inline formatting
Returns the file extension string for an image based on its MIME type metadata record
Inserts image placement markers into content markdown text and registers referenced images in the export image map

Converts an era narrative record with its heading and body content into an ordered array of ICML paragraphs
Converts a static page's title and markdown content into an ordered array of ICML paragraphs
Returns a closure function that registers image references into the referencedImages map during content export
Walks the full content tree and assembles all content items into a single ordered array of styled ICML paragraphs for the book
Builds a complete ICML document string from the content tree by wrapping the book's paragraphs in the ICML XML document structure

Builds a ZIP archive containing all book content as markdown files, organized by content tree structure with embedded images
Builds a ZIP archive containing an IDML file and supporting assets for direct import into Adobe InDesign
Generates a self-contained bash script that downloads all images referenced by an IDML export from S3 storage
Computes summary statistics for publishable content—entity, chronicle, image, page, and word count totals—to display before export

Retrieves the resolved LLM call configuration for a specific call type from the worker config
Removes common LLM response wrappers such as markdown code fences and preamble phrases from a text string
Scans a text string character by character to extract the first complete JSON object or array literal
Parses an LLM response text into a typed JSON object, throwing a warning if the result is not an object
Strips LLM wrapper text, extracts the first JSON token, and parses it into a typed value with diagnostic logging

Renders the wizard step for selecting and toggling events and relationships to include in the chronicle, with era and focal-era controls

Renders a segmented bar that shows coverage across entity-kind categories among the current ensemble assignments
Renders a detail card for a selected entity showing its name, era affiliation, story potential metrics, and role status
Renders a row of selectable chip buttons for single- or multi-select filtering of a typed set of options
Renders a small SVG area chart showing event intensity over time, optionally with a highlighted selection range

Renders a role slot card showing current assignments with add/remove/toggle-primary controls and acceptance state styling

Renders an interactive SVG brush control for selecting a sub-range along a numeric timeline extent via drag
Concatenates all generated section content from a chronicle plan into a single titled document, reporting any missing sections
Formats a human-readable summary of the chronicle plan's focus mode, entry point, and primary entities for editor display
